DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study examine certain kind fruit juice contain natural antioxidant natural anti-inflammatory property may reduce exercise-induced muscle pain injury . Participants recruit registered participant Hood To Coast Relay . The Hood To Coast Relay Race Officials post study website find interested team . Interested participant contact study staff phone regard study 's inclusion exclusion criterion schedule initial health screen visit . The participant undergo initial health screen survey muscle soreness , drink investigational juice twice daily 8 day . On 7th day drink administration , participant report start location Hood To Coast Relay meet investigator 30 minute survey muscle pain juice tolerability . The participant participate Hood To Coast Relay , drink 2 bottle juice duration relay . At conclusion relay , participant meet study investigator take short survey muscle pain juice tolerability .
DOC.criteria: Ability willingness take antiinflammatory pain relieve drug course study , seek treatment symptom muscle damage completion study race . The investigator exclude individual use antiepileptic drug pain , acupuncture , transcutaneous electrical nerve stimulation within 3 week enrollment Recent use ( within 5 halflives ) topical medications/anesthetics , muscle relaxant , tender point anesthetic injection within 2 month , systemic steroid within 3 month investigational drug/device prior 30 day .
